Top-3 Similar Questions: au_62688: How to set up cloud image in VirtualBox?
so_42775990: How do I configure shared folders for VirtualBox on Linux
au_62034: Is it possible to set the default behaviour of double clicking a folder to be "Open in New Window" with PCManFM?
Top-3 Scripts:
au_62688: mkdir /mnt/image
mount -o loop cloud-image.img /mnt/image
mkdir /mnt/image/extlinux/
extlinux --install /mnt/image/extlinux/
echo "DEFAULT /vmlinuz" > /mnt/image/extlinux/extlinux.conf
echo "APPEND root=/dev/sda init=/usr/lib/cloud-init/uncloud-init" \
     "ubuntu-pass=ubuntu ds=nocloud" >> /mnt/image/extlinux/extlinux.conf
umount /mnt/image
